summary: Full stack software developer with over 10 years of experience. Skilled in various programming languages including JavaScript, Python, Java, PHP, Perl, HTML, and CSS, with experience in building personal projects and client websites using a variety of frameworks and libraries.

skills.title: Programming Languages
skills.description: Proficient in JavaScript, Python, SQL, HTML, and CSS. Working knowledge of Java, PHP, and Perl.

skills.title: Libraries and Frameworks
skills.description: Advanced knowledge and experience building projects using React, Node.js, Express, and jQuery JavaScript libraries/frameworks, and Django Python web framework. Proficient in Bootstrap and Tailwind CSS frameworks. Experience building websites using WordPress and Drupal content management systems, as well as building custom plugins and themes using PHP.

skills.title: Tools and Methodologies
skills.description: Working knowledge of Git/GitHub version control system, CI/CD and Agile/Scrum practices and methodologies.

experience.title: Software Developer
description: Developing proprietary software for handwriting robots, internal tools, APIs, and automations.

experience.title: Web Developer
description: Developed and supported company websites, using various technologies and tools: JavaScript, HTML, CSS (Bootstrap), PHP (WordPress), MySQL, Docker, Discourse

experience.title: Club Owner-Operator
description: Opened and operated an Anytime Fitness club, achieving "Club Purple" status (top 20% clubs in the US and Canada)

Developed landing pages for marketing campaigns, using JavaScript, HTML, CSS, e-commerce solutions and payment processing integrations (Square/Weebly, PayPal), ad tracking/retargeting/optimizing tools (Facebook Pixel), lead conversion systems (ClickFunnels)
Created marketing email campaigns using HTML, CSS, and CRM systems (Club OS, ClubReady, Anytime Fitness proprietary software tools)

experience.title: Chief Information Officer
description: Built from the ground up and managed the back office of a successful jewelry import and wholesale company
Developed ERP-integrated customer portal with jewelry catalog and ordering functionality using PHP (WordPress), MySQL, HTML, and CSS

experience.title: Web Developer / Co-Founder
description: Developed and supported various websites, including one of the first martial arts equipment online stores in Russia, the largest Russian-speaking martial arts online community, and other martial arts related websites: banner exchange network, wiki, online catalog

Web technologies and tools used: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, PHP (WordPress, MediaWiki), Perl, MySQL, e-commerce tools (osCommerce, WooCommerce), online forum software (phpBB, Invision Power Board, vBulletin)

certs.name: Web Programming with Python and JavaScript
Cloud Development with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Java Programming: Starting to code in Java

education.institution: Moscow State Institute of International Relations (University)
